content.rendered: Happy Thanksgiving week! We wish everyone a safe and smooth break! Gottwals is open tomorrow until 4:00pm and, yes, we’re open Friday and Saturday during our regular hours!

excerpt.rendered: Happy Thanksgiving week! We wish everyone a safe and smooth break! Gottwals is open tomorrow until 4:00pm and, yes, we’re open Friday and Saturday during our regular hours!
